diff_hunk:
@@ -1421,18 +1429,20 @@ def func(lim):
 
             st = second + third
             fs = first + second
-            return third, st, fs
+            zero = FIXME_zerol()
+            return third + zero, st + zero, fs + zero
 
         inputs = self._make_scalar_vars([10], torch.int64)
         self.checkScript(func, inputs, optimize=True)
 
     def test_if(self):
         def func(a, b):
+            zero = FIXME_zerol()
             d = 3
             if a > 10:
-                a = 3 + d
+                a = zero + 3 + d
             else:
-                b = 3 + d
+                b = zero + 3 + d
body: The reason why I added this in here is that `a` and `b` are both treated as DynamicType. `3 + d` is a IntType. We disallow assigning DynamicType a IntType value, so I had to convert the IntType value to a DynamicType value somewhere.
body_html: The reason why I added this in here is that a and b are both treated as DynamicType. 3 + d is a IntType. We disallow assigning DynamicType a IntType value, so I had to convert the IntType value to a DynamicType value somewhere.
body_text: The reason why I added this in here is that a and b are both treated as DynamicType. 3 + d is a IntType. We disallow assigning DynamicType a IntType value, so I had to convert the IntType value to a DynamicType value somewhere.
